bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Duncan Groner worked actively with the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies during World War II.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes three booklets entitled: International conciliation, dated January 1936; After defense - what?, dated 1941; and Dollars for democracy, not dated. There is also a ten-page story entitled 'The committee to defend America by aiding the Allies'. Additionally, there are various letters and telegrams.
